subject: Re: Murray Zircon Website

full_threads.body:
Hi Chrystal,

I have responded to your questions here:
https://www.loom.com/share/30618168f73340f78126968fc0427cfa

Thanks for the video too Heath. Can I download them? Or is it best just to save the links on an excel spreadsheet for future reference?


Chrystal Goodhand
Community Liasion Officer

M 0419861712E cgoodhand@murrayzircon.com.au
W http://www.murrayzircon.com.au/


We wish to acknowledge the traditional custodians of this land and their Elders past, present and emerging. In particular those of the River Murray Mallee Aboriginal People and Kaurna, on whose land we share and operate.
We acknowledge and respect their continuing culture and the contribution they make to the life of this city and this region

Thank you Heath. The form works now.

Regarding the text changes I made last night to the form, why didn't they change on the website? I could see the changes when I was logged in to wordpress on the site and then when I logged out, the form reverted back to how it was prior to adding the text changes.


Chrystal Goodhand
Community Liasion Officer

M 0419861712E cgoodhand@murrayzircon.com.au
W http://www.murrayzircon.com.au/

Morning Chrystal,

We have made some updates, and I have recorded a quick video for you here:
https://www.loom.com/share/0732ea79479f43c79ba2794a14c7c21b?sid=0306b0f1-b39d-4977-b1e3-c813b918967e

Please do another test form submission and let me know if you receive it. Please use all of your correct contact details so the systems anti spam protection doesn't block the email confirmations.

Let me know how it goes.

Further to the below, I made some changes to the paragraph at the top of the form and they are not coming through on the site. Have I missed a step?


Chrystal Goodhand
Community Liasion Officer

M 0419861712E cgoodhand@murrayzircon.com.au
W http://www.murrayzircon.com.au/

Hi Rica

The MMCCC Form is not emailing to community@murrayzircon.com.au when I filled out the form as a test. When I submitted the test form, the 'thank you' message also did not pop up to let the user know that the form was submitted successfully. The message didn't appear until I clicked back on the menu title 'MMCCC Nomination'.

Do you know what might be the issue?

Thanks

Chrystal


Chrystal Goodhand

Hi Chrisytal,

Yes, the form notification will be send to community@murrayzircon.com.au.

Here's how to edit or change the recipient's email addres of the form:
https://scribehow.com/shared/MMCCC_Nomination_Form__0fCeJdiAQcuhk--jxO7T9A

Let me know if you need further assistance.

Thank you Rica. It would be great if you could answer the questions in my email. For instance, I would like to know how I modify on a form where it is emailed to? Will this form now be sent to community@murrayzircon.com.au when submitted?

full_threads.body:
Hi Team

I created a new form called Community Stakeholder Member - Nomination Form. How do I edit the submit button so when the form is completed and submitted, it is sent to this email community@murrayzircon.com.au ? Also, when I previewed the form, it did not look like the correct font. Will it be automatically published with the font that is part of our branding?

I had a look at how to create a new Main Menu item but I wasn't confident, so can you please add this form to a Menu item called 'MMCCC Nomination'. Alternatively, would this be better as a popup item? It needs to be in an obvious location and will come down from the website on the 19th July.

Form doc attached FYI

Kind Regards
Chrystal


Chrystal Goodhand
Community Liasion Officer

M 0419861712
